A

accessTower(Move) - Static method in class Board
Allows other classes to access the towers in board.
actionPiece(Player, ArrayList<Move>, Move) - Method in class Board
This method is called from the Game class in the method 'playerTurn'.
actionRangedPiece(Player, ArrayList<Move>, ArrayList<Move>, Move) - Method in class Board
Same as the 'actionPiece' method above except with special modifications to accommadate the functionality of ranged pieces which have separate move sets for moving and capturing.
add(Piece) - Method in class Tower
add function takes in a piece and adds it to the Tower's ArrayList.
addToBoard(Piece, Move) - Method in class Board
Adds the piece to the selected position
addToHand(Piece) - Method in class Player
Adds the piece to the player's hand
addToTower(Tower) - Method in class Tower
Takes the top piece from this tower and adds it to the top of the indicated tower
antiCheck(Piece, ArrayList<Move>) - Static method in class Board
Prevents the COMMANDER from moving into check.
archerAttackSquares(Piece, int, int) - Static method in class Board
Returns all spots an archer can attack, used to prevent commanders moving to capture
archerCap(Piece, int, int) - Static method in class Board
Gets all potential captures for Archer
archerMove(Piece, int, int) - Static method in class Board
moveset for Archer
